description_en: The total value of the money supply, as measured by M1, M2, and M3.
description_ms: Jumlah nilai penawaran wang, seperti mana yang diukur dengan menggunakan M1, M2, dan M3.
methodology_en:
Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM) is the sole issuer of currency in Malaysia and is mandated to ensure monetary stability pursuant to the Central Bank Act (2009). Accordingly, BNM is able to track the money supply at any given point in time. That data is summarised in this dataset at monthly frequency.

The following conceptual definitions of monetary aggregates are used:
- M1 = Currency in Circulation + Demand Deposits
- M2 = M1 + Narrow Quasi-Money (Savings Deposits + Fixed Deposits + NIDs + Repos + Foreign Currency Deposits)
- M3 = M2 + Deposits Placed with Other Banking Institutions, i.e. deposits and interest bearing instruments (including SPI deposits and instruments) placed by the non-bank private sector with investment banks (excluding inter-placements among banking institutions).
methodology_ms:
Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM) adalah satu-satunya penerbit mata wang di Malaysia dan diberi mandat untuk memastikan kestabilan sistem kewangan seperti mana yang termaktub dalam Akta Bank Negara Malaysia (2009). Oleh itu, BNM dapat mengesan nilai penawaran wang pada bila-bila masa. Data tersebut dirumuskan dalam set data ini pada frekuensi bulanan.

Definisi agregat kewangan tersebut adalah digunakan:
- M1 = Mata Wang dalam Edaran + Deposit Permintaan
- M2 = M1 + Separuh Wang secara Kecil (Deposit Tabungan + Deposit Tetap + NID + Repo + Deposit Mata wang Asing)
- M3 = M2 + Deposit yang Disimpan dengan Institusi Perbankan Lain, iaitu deposit atau instrumen yang memberikan pulangan faedah (termasuk deposit dan instrumen SPI) yang disimpan oleh sektor swasta bukan bank dengan bank pelaburan (tidak termasuk simpanan antara institusi perbankan tersebut).
caveat_en: This dataset begin in January 2013 because the compilation of money supply data utilised a new taxonomy from January 2014, resulting in a break with the historical series.
caveat_ms: Set data ini bermula dari January 2013 kerana proses penyusunan data penawaran wang telah menggunakan taksonomi baru bermula bulan Januari 2014, menyebabkan jeda ataupun _break_ dalam siri sejarah.
publication_en: Our site features an [interactive dashboard on the money supply](https://data.gov.my/dashboard/money-supply). This dataset is also published as part of BNM's [monthly highlights and statistics](https://www.bnm.gov.my/publications/mhs).
publication_ms: Portal kami memaparkan [_dashboard_ interaktif berkaitan penawaran wang](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/money-supply). Set data ini juga diterbitkan oleh BNM dalam Sorotan dan Statistik Bulanan](https://www.bnm.gov.my/publications/mhs).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 since the data is at monthly frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD ditetapkan sebagai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: measure
fields.description_en: [String] Type of measure, to be mapped using the [Lookup Table](https://data.gov.my/data-catalogue/lookup_money_banking) where file = 'money_aggregates'. The lookup table will give you the English and Malay definitions.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Jenis ukuran, yang perlu dipadankan dengan [Jadual Carian](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/lookup_money_banking) dengan medan file = 'money_aggregates'. Jadual carian akan memberi definisi dalam Bahasa Inggeris dan Bahasa Melayu.

fields.name: value
fields.description_en: [Float, RM mil] Supply as at the end of the period, in RM millions
fields.description_ms: [Apung, RM juta] Penawaran setakat akhir tempoh, dalam RM juta

translations_en.m3-deposit-other: M3: Deposits with Other Banking Institutions

translations_ms.m3-deposit-other: M3: Kadar Deposit di Institusi Perbankan Lain
